Test Name: Anal ThinPrep Cytology with HPV Co-Test
Specimen Type: Anal ThinPrep specimen (cells suspended in PreservCyt solution)
Purpose: To detect cellular abnormalities and identify high-risk human papillomavirus (HPV) types in anal specimens.
Equipment: ThinPrep 5000 Processor, ThinPrep Imaging System, HPV testing platform (e.g., Cobas or Hologic Aptima), microscope
